description: Pack up and head out with Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid. This ground-stomper is thru-hike-ready with an eVent™ weather-resistant bootie construction, a grippy DuraTread™ outsole, and a soft yet responsive Altra EGO™ midsole. From day hikes to thru-hikes and everything in between, the Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid is ready to romp.
name: Altra Lone Peak AW Mid - Mens
